title: Tin Foil Hat #70 (Long Story): Cannabis High-Jack with Jason Ellis and Lee Syatt
description:
Thank you for tuning into another interesting episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode the boys welcome the weed smoking legends Jason Ellis and Lee Syatt. On this episode we discuss......
1)William Randolph Hearst
2)1937 Marihuana Tax Act
3)Ronald Reagan and The War on Drugs
4)Big Pharma and Monsanto
5)Fuck Nazi White Nationalist
Thank you for tuning in we appreciate the support.
If you are in the LA area March 25th come out to the Sam Tripoli's Comedy Special Taping live at The Viper Room. If you can make please email samtripolilive@gmail.com and reserve your tickets now.
